articles.description: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.

At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!

articles.description: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.

INJ launches BlackRock BUIDL index. DWF to launch synthetic stablecoin. Vitalik to donate all L2 tokens to charity. Most VCs in crypto ‘will disappear’.

We’ve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we’ve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.

articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, innovation and utility are becoming increasingly important as investors seek projects that offer more than just hype. Among the hottest contenders in this space are Shiba Inu (SHIB) and GoodEgg (GEGG), two altcoins that are making waves not only for their meme origins but also for their real-world applications. As Silicon Valley whales start paying attention to these two projects, the conversation has shifted from mere speculation to long-term potential.
 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) Community on High Alert 
As Shiba Inu (SHIB) continues to grow, its community recently received an urgent notice. ShibArmy Scam Alerts, a vital watchdog account, has been actively warning the community about potential threats such as phishing attempts, fraudulent projects, and FUD …
articles.title: Silicon Valley Whales Weigh In: SHIB Inu vs GOODEGG—Two AI Social-Fi Cryptos with Real-World Potential, Not Just Meme Coins

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency world is no stranger to bold moves, and the latest news from San Francisco’s tech scene proves that the tides may be shifting for Dogecoin (DOGE) holders. A prominent tech entrepreneur in San Francisco recently made headlines by selling $20,000 worth of Dogecoin (DOGE) and reinvesting the entire amount into GoodEgg (GEGG), the new AI-driven dating platform that’s making waves. GoodEgg (GEGG) has already raised a whopping $320,000 in just 48 hours, positioning itself as a serious contender in the Social-Fi space.
 
Dogecoin’s (DOGE) Recent Performance 
Dogecoin (DOGE) has been a long-time favorite in the crypto community, thanks largely to the support of figures like Elon Musk. The coin, which began as a joke, has evolved into a serious player, recently experiencing a 14.…
articles.title: DOGE vs GEGG: SF Tech Entrepreneur Sells $20K in DOGE for GEGG, New Crypto Dating Platform Hits $320K in 48 Hours

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The memecoin landscape is on the verge of a major shake-up as GoodEgg (GEGG) prepares to make its mark. Unlike many meme coins in the market, GoodEgg (GEGG) combines the viral appeal of meme tokens with the practical utility of AI-powered dating and social interaction. While Dogecoin (DOGE) has held the title as the leading memecoin for years, new challengers like GoodEgg (GEGG) are rising quickly and could soon take the spotlight. Top analysts are now predicting that GEGG could hit $0.00021, positioning it as a major disruptor in the memecoin market, particularly with its unique Play-to-Date (P2D) platform that leverages AI technology.
 
Dogecoin (DOGE): The Current Memecoin Leader 
Dogecoin (DOGE) has long been the poster child for memecoins, starting as a joke but eventually growing int…

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
BlackRock and Bitcoin ETFs, according to Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchunas, have consistently stopped disastrous declines in the value of the crypto.
 
 
This coincides with speculations that BlackRock uses Coinbase’s Bitcoin IOUs to control the market, therefore shorting BTC and perhaps triggering price declines.
 
Often blamed for Bitcoin’s declines, Balchunas contends that traditional investors have actually helped to stabilize its price. According to him, many charges result from incredulity about core Bitcoin investors selling off their asset.
 
Crypto analyst Ali Martinez showed miners offloaded over 30,000 BTC in three days, indicating a sizable selling pressure originates within the Bitcoin community itself.
 
 
#Bitcoin miners have sold over 30,000 $BTC in the last 72 hours, worth …
articles.title: BlackRock And Bitcoin ETFs Shielded BTC From Massive Drops — Analyst

articles.author: Arnab Shome
articles.description:
Bybit, one of the top global crypto exchanges, has obtained a provisional license from the Dubai regulator, only two years after establishing its headquarters in the Middle Eastern city. This move brings the platform closer to becoming a fully licensed Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) in Dubai.
Strengthening Dubai Presence
Announced today (Monday), the provisional license is non-operational and was issued by the Virtual Asset Regulatory Authority (VARA). Last year, Bybit also obtained a preliminary Minimum Viable Product (MVP) license in Dubai, marking its journey towards becoming a fully licensed company in the jurisdiction.
"Dubai's strategic location, progressive policies, and innovation-driven environment offer unparalleled opportunities for businesses and investors in the cryptoc…
articles.title: Bybit Gains Provisional Crypto License in Dubai
